inclusion.criterion: Evidence of respiratory disease (either asthma or COPD)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry revealed a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 60% of the predicted

exclusion.criterion: Poor level of English language; English not first language
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
